pullRequest.title: SAK-43760 Rubrics: Can not use keyboard-only to edit criterion or rating
pullRequest.bodyText:
SAK-43760 Rubrics: Can not use keyboard-only to edit criterion or rating
SAK-43760 Rubrics: Can not use keyboard-only to edit criterion or rating

nodes.bodyText: Can you stick to the formatting in the rest of the file? Space before the opening brace and a blank line to start the function body, unless the function is only one line of code.
Did you mean to check two codes here? And, could you leave a space after the if, and one before the opening brace?
Could you take this blank line out?
Could you format this function in line with the rest of the file? And, I think you meant to test two different codes here.
Please format this like the rest of the file. And, you're checking for 32 twice.
Can you format this like the rest of the file, please? Also, you're checking for the same keycode twice.
Why bother with a const for a string you're only going to use once? Just use the string.
Same with all these variables. You don't need them.
